mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_info (member_id, restaurant_id, order_time, expect_time, price, freight, `state`, address_id) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{restaurantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{freight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order_info set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, restaurant_id = #{restaurantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expect_time = #{expectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId, jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, member_id, restaurant_id, order_time, expect_time, price, freight, `state`, address_id from order_info where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select order_id, member_id, restaurant_id, order_time, expect_time, price, freight, `state`, address_id from order_info
